item.title: Why do people Worship?
item.description: Based on the history and the observation, I can say everyone or every individual would or will look up for someone or something. And the society will revolve around what or who look for and what or who don’t look for. I see this as people searching for the meaning of the purpose of their existence. We (people) will compare each other's likes or dislikes, love or hate, and it's a no
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
